original_title: M People: One Night In Heaven
overview: A special edition of the BBC show 'Later with Jools Holland' featuring the Mancunian popsters M People. Backed by Jools, a mini orchestra and a Gospel choir, they perform a string of their best known songs in front of a specially invited audience. Tracks include 'One Night in Heaven', 'Movin' On Up' and 'Angel Street'.
title: M People: One Night In Heaven
